title: Events
description: Check out the events lined up for you and join what you like. We would love for you to engage with us!

title: Upskill
description: Widen your horizons and work on anything that interests you! Continue to improve with the help of the community. We got your back!

title: Community
description: Get to know the family! We would love to interact with you ;)

title: Projects
description: Explore your interests by building projects. For more inspiration, look into some of the most interesting projects that we have already worked on.

title: Mentorship
description: We have arranged diverse platforms for you to ping us with your doubts. Feel free to reach out to us on any of these platforms.

title: Vision
description: Enabling any student, from any department, from any background, to learn and love programming, to an extent where they can step up to teach others.
